modName: Skyrim Nexus Community Weapon Overhaul CRASH FIX
summary: a patch to fix Skyrim Nexus Community Weapon Overhaul 's crashes
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Nexus Community Weapon Overhaul is the only non boring weapon overhaul because it doesnt follow any specfic theme and you're always excited for whatever you're getting next but it made the game crash and the author did nothing about it so i decided to try fixing it and i think i did .

also if you want a fix for Invisible Weapons all you have to do is unpack the BSA files using the built in BSA extractor in  Mod orgnaizer or any other BSA extractor you're aware of. simple

this was made for personal use.

if you still get crashes while using this mod (not likely i hope) tell me where you were and i will fix it up for you if i can.

PEACE
author: ironman

files.name: Skyrim Nexus Community Weapon Overhaul ctd fix
